intro: Dodonaea microcarya, commonly known as the narrow-leaved hop萧, is a shrub native to Australia. It belongs to the family Sapindaceae and is characterized by its small, narrow leaves and clusters of yellow flowers. The plant produces small, woody pods that contain several seeds. It is often found in dry, sandy soils and is adapted to arid environments. Dodonaea microcarya is used in horticulture for its ornamental value and has some traditional uses in indigenous medicine.
